Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 820 Licensing in General

820.01Application of chapter.

820.02Licenses required.

820.03License applications.

820.04License issuance; fees.

820.05Effective period of licenses.

820.06Transferability of licenses.

820.07Display of licenses.

820.08Revocation or suspension of licenses.

820.09Appeal and review.

820.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Fees for bowling, billiard and pool establishments - see

B.R. & T. 824.01

Licenses for circuses, carnivals and shows - see B.R. & T.

832.01 et seq.

Taxicab licenses - see B.R. & T. 856.02 et seq.
